narrative:
The space
Spectacular estate in Subachoque Cundinamarca. Located 40 minutes from Bogota. Incredible scenery, peace of mind, an excellent encounter with nature. Own home that features living room, large kitchen with dining area integrated auxiliary social, social bathroom, 4 bedrooms each with private bathroom and hot water. Ideal to break the routine and discover a haven of peace.

Easy access to the town very close (Subachoque) where it is very easy to get food and basic necessities. It has areas where you can make barbecues and social gatherings without pertubar anyone.

"Subachoque Chibcha language that means" Labour Front or Front to Work "in the Aboriginal peoples inhabited Subachoques and Chingas, which belonged to the Chibcha and Muisca tribes. During the early years of the colony, the Royal Court awarded lands in the valley Subachoque some Spanish settlers, who by the year of 1594 ordered the posting of Subachoques the Municipality today Chingas Tabio and Tenjo the Population. With the transfer of these communities, the Valley was under Subachoque Spanish rule. elapsed fifty years, the descendants of the ancient Aboriginal communities escaped the charge of Subachoque Tabio and returned to work as servants and then give rise to new families mestizo (Spanish with Chibchas Crossing) that would be responsible populating this area. Later, and by the year 1754, Subachoque Valley was inhabited by about 750 people. By this time, the priest Roque Jacinto Zubieta Salgado and ordered to build a chapel in Hacienda Gates was called San Miguel Gate, which started the foundation of what is now the City of Subachoque, on March 16, 1774. located in Subachoque Ecological ride, nature walks, fresh air, peace and quiet, natural green, landscape Riches , People Friendly, Food, Lodging, Organic Farming, beautiful trails, Outdoor Activities and MUCH MORE ........... " Taken from (URL HIDDEN)
